subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: To boost his listless team, Coach Claude Julien put together Daniel Paille, Tyler Seguin and Chris Kelly, who produced the goal that tied the score in the second and the winner in overtime.
snippet: To boost his listless team, Coach Claude Julien put together Daniel Paille, Tyler Seguin and Chris Kelly, who produced the goal that tied the score in the second and the winner in overtime.
